reference.shortdesc: The msgnum element identifies the number of a message that is produced by an application or program.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: This element is part of the software domain.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The msgnum element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the software domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the msgnum element identifies the number of the message returned by an application.
example.codeblock: A server log entry of I:0 is equivalent to the text message informational: successful.
